title: X Games Munich | Global Rallycross Slow Motion Special
description:
Ken Block nabs X Games silver and Toomas Heikkinen bronze at the first Global Rallycross race in Munich both in Ford Fiesta ST.

This is the Ford Racing slow motion special.

Watch the second Global Rallycross race  LIVE Sunday, 11:00 AM ET on ESPN or ESPN3.com
